Clay lessons from professionals

Our professionals will teach you how to make beauty from clay. We’re the pros in our business and know everything about what we do. You will get unforgettable emotions, working with us. We have the newest equipment and the best teachers, who has a masters degree in it.

Try unlimited one-day clay - only $50

Our story

Our company was created in the 2015 year and since that time, we have been teaching people to work with clay. We work out new techniques and made a lot of people happy.

Gallery

With us, you will learn the art of clay and became a real professional in this sphere, because we have the best teachers and our students are always happy after the lessons.

Plans

Choose your plan and let’s make beauty together. Our classes are taught by top practitioners.

Basic

$250/ month
  • - All techniques and equipment
  • - 2 hours of instruction / week
  • - 5lbs of clay
  • - Glazing & firing
  • - Open Studio hours (9 am — 11 am) 2 times a week

Standard

$350/ month
  • - All techniques and equipment
  • - 6 hours of instruction / week
  • - 15lbs of clay
  • - Glazing & firing
  • - Open Studio hours (6 pm — 9 pm) 3 times a week

Premium

$650/ month
  • - All techniques and equipment
  • - Personal instructor 10 hours /week
  • - Unlimited clay
  • - All night access 24/7
  • - Unlimited Open Studio hours to come in and practice outside of class
